name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 9 (report), comrades from the National Medical Insurance and Drug Administration accepted interviews from reporters from the People's Daily client on issues related to the centralized procurement of drugs.
Media person Xiang Dongliang published an article questioning why there was no author's signature in the report, and the words "relevant comrades, relevant experts, researchers, anesthesiologists" and other pronouns appeared dozens of times in the entire report. There was no real name in the entire article from beginning to end.
Therefore, the reporter of this interview report did not exist, and the leader who was interviewed was unfounded.
Xiang Dongliang said that reports without the names of the interviewees would be judged by professionals as "purely fictitious"
At present, Xiang Dongliang's questioning article has been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Beijing Medical Insurance Bureau: Starting from February 28, 200 types of Chinese medicine granules can be reimbursed by medical insurance. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjXAEQyaMAAAX-N.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"Electronic tombstones are the last traces they left online in the face of death"
Many netizens found that many accounts in the comment area under a news article about the COVID-19 pandemic in 2020 were cancelled. Some said they were cancelled voluntarily, while others said that the account may have been recycled after the person died. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1888859841185116160/pu/img/I3MCm1gt_UWfRrtY.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: As of February 10, the total box office of the animated film "Nezha: The Devil Boy Conquers the Dragon King" exceeded US$1.152 billion (approximately RMB 8.419 billion), surpassing "Aquaman" and entering the top 30 of the global box office history list. It is also the only non-Hollywood film in the top 30 box office films.

Spokesperson Guo Jiakun said that he did not know the specific situation. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjaX3AjWoAASjDa.jpg

content: As Musk's Government Efficiency Department carries out large-scale reforms on the US government, some netizens imagine which departments Musk would cut if he were in China. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjaqPZ9W0AEjQK8.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 10, a school in Hohhot issued a notice to students stating that it had received a notice from the higher-level education authorities, requiring students not to participate in the following activities
1. Do not log in to the external network
2. Do not participate in any research or investigation activities without approval
3. Do not post comments or comments on the Internet at will
4. Pay attention to strengthening personal information protection
5. Establish national security awareness and keep state secrets

https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjarGMGXwAEcfCs.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Be careful
At noon on February 10, a car suddenly ran a red light and hit a pedestrian at the Guihua Park subway station on Shuguang Middle Road in Changsha, Hunan Province https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1888900321470017536/pu/img/DaCDr5SFd2fIJgf_.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the school wall of Xinjiang Shihezi No. 1 Middle School was suppressed by the school. The students of the school submitted an article:
There is also a student wall in our school. The students on the wall actively discuss and speak freely, encouraging each other to think about social phenomena and problems in campus life. However, this kind of communication full of positive energy has been severely suppressed by some teachers
In order to maintain the so-called order, some teachers actually use mutual reporting and elimination of penalties to restrict students' free expression
They require students to actively report each other, turning the original normal discussion into a situation of mutual suspicion and mutual supervision. This practice not only stifles everyone's spirit of exploration, but also seriously infringes on the freedom of speech that we as students should have. In addition, during the National Day, the school actually deducted the students' vacation time. What's more incredible is that some students were dissatisfied with the school's deduction and reported to the Education Bureau. The school teacher found out and was punished, which turned the vacation that was supposed to be a rest and recuperation into a punishment...
fullContent:
近日 新疆石河子一中校园墙遭学校打压，该校学生投稿：
在我们学校同样存在一个学生墙，墙上的同学们积极讨论、畅所欲言，鼓励彼此思考社会现象和校园生活中的问题。然而这种充满正能量的交流却遭部分教师的严厉打压
一些老师为了维护所谓的秩序，竟然采用互相举报、消处分等手段限制学生的自由表达
他们要求同学们主动举报彼此，将原本正常的讨论变成了互相猜疑、互相监督的局面。这种做法不仅扼杀了大家的探索精神，还严重侵犯了我们作为学生应有的言论自由。并且在国庆期间，学校竟克扣了同学们的假期时间，更令人难以置信的是，有同学因不满学校的克扣向教育局举报被学校老师发现反而受到处分，使得原本应该是休息调养的假期变成了被惩罚的时刻，荒谬之极。
尽管面临如此严峻的压制，学生墙上的同学们并未因此沉默。相反，他们更加团结，纷纷利用文字表达对不公现象的愤怒和反抗。在墙上，我们看到了许多揭露学校内部暴政的帖子，也有不少勇于发声、捍卫自我权利的文字。甚至在另一块学生墙上，曾有一位同学面对不实的诋毁，果断写下反驳文章，严正指出对方言论中的漏洞，使诋毁者无言以对。这种敢于直面问题、勇于抗争的精神，正是我们这一代人追求公正、争取权益的真实写照。
我衷心希望李老师能关注这一情况，将我们在校园中遭遇的不公以及勇于发声、坚守正义的真实情形传递给更多的人。我们并非无理取闹，而是在寻求一个尊重学生意见、鼓励自由讨论的公平环境。只有在这样一个开放、包容的氛围中，同学们才能真正发挥出自己的智慧与潜力。希望有关部门也能重视这些问题，切实保护每一位学生的合法权益，消除校园中的不合理限制和压制。
感谢您的阅读与支持，期待您的关注和帮助。愿我们的声音能够唤起更多人对公正和自由的追求，共同推动校园环境的改善和教育体制的进步。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 9, the Ministry of Civil Affairs released the marriage registration data of previous years.
In 2024, the number of registered marriages nationwide was 6.1 million, a year-on-year decrease of 20.5%, the lowest since 1996. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gja9OORXsAAeK3V.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 10, at Xingyue Plaza in Bazhong City, Sichuan Province, owners of unfinished buildings defended their rights https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1888894996662648832/pu/img/qn92YDX8Xf_35Xi2.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, more and more workers have released videos to report the 12-hour two-shift work system under their real names, demanding that the country strictly enforce the Labor Law. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1888911944297357312/pu/img/Ly5GfeezUDoPSmSv.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: One netizen talked about the 12-hour work system and said: "Many people say, "Won't you refuse to work overtime?" In fact, we have the right to refuse, but we cannot afford the cost of refusal. If you want to get a salary that can feed yourself, you must sacrifice the life you deserve. The real problem is that the basic salary should be increased." https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1888922742809821184/pu/img/xRhqMzmkmU2KEU9K.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Consumer inflation, industrial deflation.

On February 10, the National Bureau of Statistics released inflation data for January. China's CPI rose 0.5% year-on-year in January, higher than the 0.1% increase in December and higher than the 0.4% expected by economists. Food and service prices climbed before the Spring Festival holiday. PPI fell 2.3% year-on-year in January, the same decline as in December.

Among the goods and services that drove the CPI increase, pork prices rose 13.8% year-on-year in January, movie and performance ticket prices rose 11.0%, and air ticket prices rose 8.9%, the National Bureau of Statistics said.

content: On February 8, in Wuzhi, Henan, a villager posted a video saying that his 20 mu of wheat was maliciously destroyed in the early morning. The perpetrator drove a high-powered tractor into the wheat field, crushed the 20 mu of wheat field into a wasteland, and then abandoned the car and fled. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1888948990374227968/pu/img/o7-CVfXemfLx128Z.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 10, Jiasheng Heating Company gathered citizens who went to defend their rights and demanded a refund of heating fees.
It is reported that from February 5 to 8, the heating company stopped heating, claiming that the equipment was faulty. Later it was revealed that the government owed money and there was no coal reserve, which led to the equipment shutdown. It happened to be the coldest days of winter, and the temperature in the homes of users in the jurisdiction was only about ten degrees, and many elderly people and children felt uncomfortable. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1888958084506148864/pu/img/OjNFXb4CFPl1OYov.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, JD.com has quietly entered the food delivery industry. JD.com claims, "Delivery in as fast as 9 minutes, commission as low as 5%!"
Currently, JD.com Food Delivery does not have an independent APP. You need to open the JD.com APP, first enter the "Second Delivery" section in the upper right corner, and then select the "Food Delivery" business entrance.
However, although JD.com Food Delivery has not yet posed a threat, Meituan has begun to be vigilant. According to rumors, Meituan's business development in many places has held emergency meetings to discuss reducing commissions to retain customers, and the commission rate in some cities has been reduced.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a netizen submitted a post saying that he encountered a cybersecurity scam on Telegram. Some fraud gangs will forge the official Telegram team account, send messages to inform users that their accounts have been frozen and need to be verified, and steal the user's account password during the verification process. Please be vigilant, netizens who use VPNs, do not click on links at will, and do not give out passwords and verification codes at will. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gjb9IelX0AAAaWo.jpg
